channel.title: Help with no-ip
channel.description: ok on my recent post i was told to download no-ip well tried it and it makes my computer not let me use my mouse and it takes over 3 hours to use it so i was wondering if some 1 could post on here a better adress then no-ip and give the link to it now my last topic got over 90 post in it on a new compiler i was needing to get well maybe this will have ppl disagreeing with ppl lol well plz dont flamm me or spamm this post and i hope you guys and girls will help find 1 plz and ty I HAVE HELPED SO MANY PPL NOW ITS UR TURN TO RETURN THE FAVOR BY GIVING ME REP LOL AND HELPING ME

item.title: Help with no-ip
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

[br][size=1]Posted on: August 22, 2007, 01:54:50 PM[/size][hr]i typed the the ip adress i made it with and it says it is offline but i typed in the 0.0.0.0 like it says when u click run server so what do i do then?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 22, 2007, 01:56:11 PM[/size][hr]so if it wont let me run it so ppl can come in then what do i have to do to make so they can come in?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with no-ip
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

just because your on it doesnt mean anyone else can go on… well unless you actully typed the no-ip address in the IP spot. log off and log back on. check.

Read full topic

item.description:

Nope, says its offline. You have your RunServer file running right?

item.title: Help with no-ip
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

nvm lol i figured it out i added the server to my host the name is pk2pkscape.no-ip.biz port 43594 its my first server but have fun lmao[br][size=1]Posted on: August 22, 2007, 01:36:14 PM[/size][hr]ok nvm it says when i tried to add it to mopars server list it says it is offline so i need so 1 to test this for me and go on this 1 edgepkscape.bounceme.net port 43594 i need some1 to try it out so i know if other ppl can log in on it

Read full topic

item.title: Help with no-ip
item.dc:creator: @Aero_Mist Aero Mist
item.description:
@Aero_Mist wrote:

http://www.no-ip.com in the top-right corner there is a log in, you enter your email and your password, and log in. Then on the right there is a neat little menu with, Hosts/Redirects and some options. You click add and fill out the info. Click accept and it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with no-ip
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

ok the thing is you have to download it to make it work so u can post it and have a ip adress well you probally already had it downloaded and u never knew it so if u said u only loged and changed host then tell me how u did it

Read full topic

item.title: Help with no-ip
item.dc:creator: @Aero_Mist Aero Mist
item.description:
@Aero_Mist wrote:

Download? It’s the second time i heard that today… I didn’t download anything. I went to no-ip.com, signed up, added a new host, used my run server file, and logged on. Everything worked, and my friend could log on so there were no problems.

Read full topic
